name: Fly Game: Real Jet Pilot
description:
Fly Game: Real Jet Pilot is the most realistic flying game with smooth controls, takeoff and landing gears. Successfully complete all challenging and flying missions. Become the best commercial jet pilot by taking off your jet plane in the air and transport passengers from one airport to the other airport.
Features:
Different airplane missions like landing and taking off
New improved airplane physics
Change your view to Cockpit view
Different airports to land your aircraft and to take off
